headline: Joyride: script VSCode like Emacs but using Clojure
description:
Together with PEZ (Peter Str√∂mberg) I made a VSCode extension that allows you to script VSCode using Clojure (interpreted CLJS).

The repo: https://github.com/BetterThanTomorrow/joyride

Introductory video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1oTf-1EchU

See examples directory:

https://github.com/BetterThanTomorrow/joyride/tree/master/examples/.joyride/scripts

See animated gifs and news on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/hashtag/vsjoyride?src=hashtag_click&f=live
